        Description copied from interface: SelectionModel
        Creates a multi-caret selection for the rectangular block of text with specified start and end positions.

      • getBlockSelectionStarts

        public int [] getBlockSelectionStarts()
        Description copied from interface: SelectionModel
        Returns an array of start offsets in the document for ranges selected in the document currently. Works both for a single-caret and a multiple-caret selection (for carets not having a selection, caret position is returned).
        Specified by:
        getBlockSelectionStarts in interface SelectionModel
        Returns:
        an array of start offsets, array size is equal to the number of carets existing in the editor currently.

      • getBlockSelectionEnds

        public int [] getBlockSelectionEnds()
        Description copied from interface: SelectionModel
        Returns an array of end offsets in the document for ranges selected in the document currently. Works both for a single-caret and a multiple-caret selection (for carets not having a selection, caret position is returned).
        Specified by:
        getBlockSelectionEnds in interface SelectionModel
        Returns:
        an array of start offsets, array size is equal to the number of carets existing in the editor currently.

      • copySelectionToClipboard

        public void copySelectionToClipboard()
        Description copied from interface: SelectionModel
        Copies the currently selected text to the clipboard. When multiple selections exist in the document, all of them are copied, as a single piece of text.
        Specified by:
        copySelectionToClipboard in interface SelectionModel
